member.name: T:Xpandables.NetCore.HtmlScriptExtensions
member.summary: Provides with helper to add script to partial views.

member.name: M:Xpandables.NetCore.HtmlScriptExtensions.Script(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.Func{System.Object,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.HelperResult})
member.summary: Adds a partial view script to the HTTP context to be rendered in the parent view. In the partial view, add the script like so : @Html.Script(/* your script here */)
member.param: The script template to be used.

member.name: M:Xpandables.NetCore.HtmlScriptExtensions.RenderPartialViewScript(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper)
member.summary: Renders any scripts used within the partial views. In the layout view, add the script like so : @Html.RenderPartialViewScript()
